name: RodMän
overview: Guide RodMän around the maze, collecting the round purple things. Also collect the yellow diamonds because they're bombs and can be used to blow up RodMän's enemies. When moving around, avoid the things which are also moving around, as they aren't very nice. Apparently, the things that move are called ● Naughtly Nic ● Dirty Tim ● Desperate Dave ● Spurious Pete ● Teflon Timmy Although no one knows why. There are three levels, and each level has three screens: ● Garden ● House ● Basement Giving a total of nine unique screens.
